articles.title: Taurine may be key to a longer and healthier life - Medical News Today
articles.description: Researchers say taurine, a compound found in the human body, was effective as an anti-aging agent that promoted longevity in mice. More research needs to be done on taurine's effect on reversing aging in humans.
